headline: Why consumer staple stocks like Walmart & Costco crushed it in 2024
summary: The Consumer Staples Select Sector SPDR Fund (XLP) is seeing steady gains this year, rising more than 10%. Market Domination Overtime host Akiko Fujita names some of the top performers including Walmart (WMT), Costco (COST), Philip Morris (PM), and Colgate-Palmolive (CL). Walmart is on track for its biggest annual share price gain in decades. On the other hand, Costco continues to drive in big gains with cost-conscious consumers and growth in its e-commerce businesses. Another consumer doing well is Philip Morris — with the tobacco consumer gaining 30% in its smoke-free products. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here. This post was written by Josh Lynch

headline: Wall Street Analysts Think Walmart (WMT) Is a Good Investment: Is It?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Walmart (WMT) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: Walmart Stock Surges 76% in 2024: Is WMT Still a Buy for 2025?
summary: Innovation, tech investments and high-margin revenue streams place WMT well for growth in 2025, though near-term concerns and a high valuation suggest caution.

raw.headline: Walmart Stock Surges 76% in 2024: Is WMT Still a Buy for 2025?

headline: 3 Reasons to Sell WMT and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Walmart has been a great trade, beating the S&P 500 by 25.8%. Its stock price has climbed to $92.72, representing a healthy 35.8% increase. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.

headline: US holiday retail sales come in above forecast, Mastercard says
summary: U.S. retail sales rose 3.8% between Nov. 1 and Dec. 24, as customers turned to last minute shopping due to intense holiday season promotions, a Mastercard report showed on Thursday. The...
